msbt.message: Hey, I thought you should know that some kind of bird seems to have washed up on the shore. Or maybeit just got tired and decided to take a nap? Either way, maybe we should wake it up.

! Guess what!K.K.—THE K.K. Slider—will be playing in the event plaza today. All day long! And get this? After sunset, he'll start taking audience requests!So yeah, anyone who's anyone is gonna be there.
Did you see that Label is visiting? I ran into her earlier and handed her one of my new headshots. Thought maybe I could do a little fashion modeling, you know? Fingers crossed!

Yo! I hear my favorite wandering artisan's rolled up on le island. That's right, Saharah is here. If you're thinking about redecorating, she's the one to talk to, . She has aunique way of doing business. As an artisan myself, I can respect that, .
Yo, there's a K.K. concert going on at Resident Services, like, RIGHT NOW!I hear he's taking audience requests as we speak!

Oh, by the way, did you know that Joan's granddaughter is here right now? Yeah, her name's Daisy Mae, and from what I've heard, she's a real chip off the old turnip. I mean that as a compliment, just in case you don't like turnips. Ha HA!

Hey, .Have you seen that unfamiliar boat anchored off 's northern shore? It's the one giving off black smoke and a weird vibe that has me shaking in my stylish, yet metaphorical boots. I don't want to cause undue panic, but I tried out for this horror movie, and it ended badly. AND I didn't get the part.
Have you noticed that something is justofftoday? I feel like I'm being stalked by the paparazzi. And not in a good way!
Uh, ? Have you been to the plaza lately?Becauseit kind of seems like K.K. is putting on a concert in your honor, like, right now. You might want to check it out. Just saying.
I guess K.K. is putting on some kind of birthday show in the plaza right now. I wish I was getting my own birthday-boy performance
Guess what, .<10_4 /> Mabel is visiting as we speak! I'm always excited to see what kind of fashion-forward items she'll have with her If my style is unoffending, then I might as well be pretending
I hear that C.J. is on the island right nowFolks are saying he's cool and friendly and knows all kinds of interesting stories. But that's what folks say about ME, isn't it?
You know what? At this very moment, Flick is visiting . I've heard that he makes some really interesting fashion choices, so I'm gonna have to see for myself.
Word is Kicks is currently kickin' it in the plaza, .Shoes don't really go with my overall look, but I've got a lot of respect for that guy's style.
By the way, I saw Celeste wandering around earlier.She was probably looking for a good spot to stargaze.Ha! That should be easy. There's not a bad spot to stargaze on !

Hey! Let me ask you something Is there someone behind me?Wait! Don't tell me! I don't think I want to know!<10_4 /> No, I need to know. Who's there?! Oh. There's no one? That's weird.For the past few minutes I've been hearing footsteps. I was sure someone was following me. Based on the distinct pitter-patterI'd guess that someone was wearing a bodysuit made from a combination of polyester and natural fibers. Eh, I must've been imagining things orI may have just stumbled onto the next big fashion craze!

That Leif guy's vibe is sorelaxed. It's just the type of attitude my "chill guy" persona should emulate. I wonder how he does it. Is it the plants? Maybe it's the plants.When I stop by to sell him some weeds later, I'm going to ask what his secret is, .

You know, I like to think of myself as a kind of special ambassador for . So whenever I see someone new wandering around, I always approach them and introduce myself. I recommend that you do the same, but ONLY within the safe harbor of , got it?
